imdb.plot outline: Dr. Brenda Jefferson is a Holy-Ghost filled woman of God, and Pastor of Covenant Faith Praise and Worship Center in Sherwood, AR. She teaches the uncompromising Word of God as the guidepost to abundant living, and she preaches the Gospel of the Kingdom with power and authority. You can see Empowering Keys for Kingdom Living each Friday at 10:30am on VTN-TV.
imdb.title: Empowering Keys for Kingdom Living with Dr. Brenda Jefferson
akas: Empowering Keys for Kingdom Living with Dr. Brenda Jefferson (United States)
